ping.commandDescription: Check the bot's latency and other useful information.
ping.title: Pong!

cloneEmoji.commandDescription: Clone an emoji to the server.
cloneEmoji.title: Emoji Cloned
cloneEmoji.desc: The emoji {{emoji}} has been cloned to the server.

help.commandDescription: Get help for a command or a list of commands.

bigEmoji.commandDescription: Get the large image form and link of an emoji(s).

afk.messageFieldDescription: The message to display when you are AFK.
afk.durationFieldDescription: The duration of your AFK status.
afk.attachmentFieldDescription: The attachment to display when you are AFK.
afk.title: AFK Set
afk.desc_with_message: You are now AFK with the message: {{message}}.
afk.desc_with_message_and_duration: You are now AFK with the message: {{message}} until {{time}}.
afk.overwriteNote: Your previous AFK status has been overwritten.
afk.removeDescription: You are no longer AFK. You were AFK for {{time}}.
afk.removeTip: You can stop this by suffixing your message with --afk
afk.blockedAfk: You cannot ping that user because they're AFK.

afklink.commandDescription: Link your Google Calendar to Pomelo to automatically set your AFK status when you're busy.
afklink.title: Link Google Calendar
afklink.desc: Click the button below to link your Google Calendar. Once you link your calendar, click Link ID. You will be prompted for a link code.
afklink.successDesc: Your Google Calendar has been linked to Pomelo.
afklink.selectCalendarsDescription: Select the calendars you want to link to Pomelo.

afkget.userFieldDescription: The user to get the afk status of
